content.question: Which of the following is played?

choices.label: The figure presents two measures of music in treble clef. The key signature has three sharps and the time signature is 4/4.
The figure presents two measures of music in treble clef. The key signature has three sharps and the time signature is 4/4.
The figure presents two measures of music in treble clef. The key signature has three sharps and the time signature is 4/4.
The figure presents two measures of music in treble clef. The key signature has three sharps and the time signature is 4/4.

content.answer: The figure presents two measures of music in treble clef. The key signature has three sharps and the time signature is 4/4.

unit.text: 2: Music Fundamentals II - Minor Scales and Key Signatures, Melody, Timbre, and Texture

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
